holidays.title: Day of Sanctity and Protection of Human Life
holidays.description: Today reflects on how precious life is — no matter how short it is.

holidays.title: National Gourmet Coffee Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the crème de la crème of the caffeine world!

holidays.title: National Michigan Day
holidays.description: We celebrate the Great Lakes State with all its history and in all its glory.

holidays.title: National Peking Duck Day
holidays.description: Peking duck is the national dish of China, one of its many gifts to the world.

holidays.title: National Thesaurus Day
holidays.description: On Thesaurus Day, we are happy, merry, delighted, and overjoyed!

holidays.title: World Religion Day
holidays.description: Our differences make us stronger, so join us in celebrating our different beliefs and cultures.

holidays.title: World Snow Day
holidays.description: ‘Enjoy, experience and explore’ —  the motto of World Snow Day, which we’re taking seriously indeed.

holidays.title: AA Milne’s Birthday
holidays.description: A pioneer in children’s literature, Milne contributed immensely to this genre throughout his entire career.

holidays.title: Cary Grant’s Birthday
holidays.description: Cary Grant might be from a different time, but his work is still relevant today.

holidays.title: Eugene Lee Yang’s Birthday
holidays.description: The possibilities are endless for this multi-talented celebrity, and we’d love to see them.

holidays.title: Isaac Elliot Rivera’s Birthday
holidays.description: We are looking forward to what this budding reality star achieves for himself.

holidays.title: Jonathan Davis’s Birthday
holidays.description: His distinctive personality and great music influenced the next generation of musicians and performers.

holidays.title: Karan Brar’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young actor's contribution to making childhood entertainment memorable is valued by the Gen-Z generation.

holidays.title: Kevin Costner’s Birthday
holidays.description: Known as one of Hollywood’s most generous actors, we’re excited to celebrate his birthday.

holidays.title: Linda Sun’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young star is on the right path to greatness and we love to see it!

holidays.title: Lps Dave’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this cool YouTuber, all we have to say is we sure love timeless classics.

holidays.title: Nathaniel Simonsen’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nathaniel Simonsen, the young and talented social media sensation, is winning hearts on social media.
